attributes.additional_details:
To set up an implement a national waste and recycling polcy that all councils are required to follow to remove the difference of schemes between counties and county and district councils. Which would remove the problems have understanding the extremely complicated schemes.

Also in courage all councils if they offer a trade waste scheme to introduce recycling so they lead by example.

This would be very useful for Village and Community premises who are classed as commercial properties who are unable to have there waste recycled and therefore it goes straight to landfill. When they could very easily be implemented into the existing wheely bin schemes offered to domestic properties subject to a small fee.
